description: 19-07-2018 How to Block Your Location Data: The very simplest method to help protect your location data from being broadcast across the Internet is to block it. title: How to prevent police from tracking my phone - Quora
description: 10-03-2020 That is the easiest way to prevent tracking of a specific phone number. A phone that is turned off is not communicating with cell towers. It is the cell tower information, and triangulation, that allows authorities to follow the movements of a person through the use of their cell phone. Turn off the phone, no signal.
